SEARCH
Package userInterface

Class ReplenishManageUI

java.lang.Object
userInterface.ReplenishManageUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
ReplenishManageInterface
public class ReplenishManageUI extends Object implements ReplenishManageInterface
This class implements ReplenishManageInterface to provide a user interface for managing inventory replenish requests.

This class includes methods for viewing, submitting, and managing replenish requests for inventory items. It is designed for use by administrators and pharmacists.

  • Method Details

    • viewReplenishRequest

      public void viewReplenishRequest()
      Displays the list of all replenish requests.
      Specified by:
      viewReplenishRequest in interface ReplenishManageInterface

    • addReplenish

      public void addReplenish(Scanner sc, Medicine medicineName)
      Submits a replenish request for a specific medication.

      This method is intended for pharmacists to request restocking of items. It validates the item and ensures a valid quantity is entered before generating the request.

      Specified by:
      addReplenish in interface ReplenishManageInterface
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for user input.
      medicineName - The Medicine for which the replenish request is to be submitted.

    • manageReplenish

      public void manageReplenish(Scanner sc)
      Manages a specific replenish request.

      This method is intended for administrators to review, approve, or reject replenish requests. It prompts the user for the request ID and processes the request accordingly.

      Specified by:
      manageReplenish in interface ReplenishManageInterface
      Parameters:
      sc - A Scanner object for user input.

    • submitReplenish

      public void submitReplenish(Scanner sc, Pharmacist pharmacist, ReplenishManageInterface replenishManageInterface, InvenManageInterface invenManageInterface)
      Submits a replenish request by first displaying the current replenish requests and then allowing the pharmacist to choose a medication.
      Specified by:
      submitReplenish in interface ReplenishManageInterface
      Parameters:
      sc - The Scanner object to capture user input.
      pharmacist - The pharmacist submitting the replenish request.
      replenishManageInterface - The interface for managing replenish requests.
      invenManageInterface - The interface for managing inventory.
